In diplomacy , an " Envoy
Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary " , in short Envoy , is under the terms of the Congress of Vienna of 1815 , a diplomat of the second class , ranking between an Ambassador and a Minister Resident . Usually just referred to as a Minister , an Envoy is a diplomatic representative , not considered a representative of the head of state , but nonetheless with plenipotentiary powers ( i.e. full authority to represent the government ) .
